title: The Fight For Kinda Funny CEO Part Two I Mario Party Superstars
description:
The Fight For Kinda Funny Ceo continues with part two of our Mario Party Superstars tournament. Kevin, Barrett, Nick, and Roger land on the board for a 30 turn game to decide who will move onto the finals to battle against Tim and Mike to compete for the title of CEO. WHO WILL WIN!
